# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and high-quality materials, it's truly a game-changer in its category. For a limited time, I'm offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $95. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our top-tier solution. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer
